Roma Nebo

16 Oct 2021
Silent Hill, 458

big solo concert

Roma Nebo in Paris! On November 2, a concert of the famous artist Roma Nebo will take place in the Ibiza nightclub.

Buy Tickets$48

Why is it worth visiting the big universal concert?

01
Be part of the largest festival and global event in Eastern Europe
02
Hear the best performers live and attend the live performances of Western stars
03
Relax with friends the way you have long dreamed of
About event
New album presentation and greatest hits - meet Roma Nebo at ibiza nightclub
One of the most famous artists of our time will shake Paris with a cool show program, which will include all the songs that the audience loved - "Let Me On The Dance Floor", "Bird", "War Girl"and other YouTube millionaires. In addition, the guests of the evening will be the first to hear the work of the new album live!
